text:
Rambl | Minneapolis MN | Onsite

At Rambl we’re helping businesses grow by capturing, learning and training from spoken customer conversations. We’re utilizing a ubiquitous data source using cutting edge AI techniques and customers love our product.

You'll be joining one of the most successful teams to come out of the midwest. Our founders previously started Code42, the leader in enterprise endpoint data security and recovery, and have raised over $130M in funding.

We're looking for mission-minded team members who aren't afraid to say what should be done and have the talent plus tenacity to get it done.

We are hiring both a senior engineer (Ruby/JS) and a support engineer. Read more and apply here: https://rambl.workable.com/
